title: COAST ORB / laughingatscene
description: Convo with Logic about the scene of the party

dialogueTree.title: Logic: "This is it -- the scene of the part..."
dialogueTree.english: This is it -- the scene of the party. The fire pit, cigarettes, and empty bottles all evidence it.
dialogueTree.polish: Oto jest – miejsce imprezy. Pozostałość po ogniu, papierosy i puste butelki, niezbite dowody.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Вось яно – месца вечарыны. Вогнішча, цыгарэты і пустыя бутэлькі - усё сведчыць аб гэтым.

links.title: You: "Hold up -- don't you mean scene of..."
links.english: Hold up -- don't you mean scene of the crime?
links.polish: Zaraz. Nie masz na myśli miejsca zbrodni?
links.belarusian: Чакай. Ты не маеш на ўвазе месца злачынства?

links.title: Logic: "Not as such. I'm talking about what..."
links.english: Not as such. I'm talking about what came after -- the party scene.
links.polish: Nie samej w sobie. Mam na myśli to, co było później. Miejsce imprezy.
links.belarusian: Не само па сабе. Я маю на ўвазе тое, што адбылося потым. Месца вечарыны.

links.title: You: "Yeah. Sure does look like a lot of..."
links.english: Yeah. Sure does look like a lot of folks partied here.
links.polish: Tak. Ewidentnie wygląda, jakby bawiło się tu sporo ludzi.
links.belarusian: Так. Выглядае, нібыта тут адпачывала шмат людзей.

links.title: Logic: "Looks like they were here a while,..."
links.english: Looks like they were here a while, judging from all the bottles. The sunken motor carriage provided them a focal point -- like a goose ice-sculpture or a chocolate fountain.
links.polish: Sądząc po liczbie butelek, byli tu ładny kawałek czasu. Zatopiony powóz motorowy był dobrym miejscem spotkań. Niczym lodowa rzeźba gęsi albo czekoladowa fontanna.
links.belarusian: Мяркуючы па ўсіх гэтых бутэльках, яны былі тут даволі доўга. Затоплены маторны экіпаж стаў для іх цэнтрам увагі. Нібыта ледзяная скульптура гусі ці шакаладны фантан.

links.title: You: ""Hey, Kim. Looks like we've had a c..."
links.english: "Hey, Kim. Looks like we've had a couple of party-goers here."
links.polish: „Hej, Kim. Wygląda na to, że mieliśmy tu kilku imprezowiczów”.
links.belarusian: «Гэй, Кім. Выглядае на тое, што ў нас тут было некалькі аматараў вечарынак.»

links.title: You: ""Looks like they had a great time l..."
links.english: "Looks like they had a great time laughing here."
links.polish: „Zdaje się, że świetnie się tu bawili, była kupa śmiechu”.
links.belarusian: "Здаецца, што тут цудоўна і весела бавілі час."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hey -- let's keep moving, detectiv..."
links.english: "Hey -- let's keep moving, detective." The lieutenant adjusts his glasses.
links.polish: „Hej, ruszajmy dalej, detektywie” – porucznik poprawia swoje okulary.
links.belarusian: «Гэй, рушым далей, дэтэктыў», — лейтэнант папраўляе свае акуляры.

links.title: Empathy: "Somehow he doesn't want to dwell on..."
links.english: Somehow he doesn't want to dwell on it...
links.polish: Z jakiegoś powodu nie chce się nad tym pochylać...
links.belarusian: Па нейкай прычыне ён не хоча ў гэта паглыбляцца...

links.title: You: ""This was some kind of theatre to t..."
links.english: "This was some kind of theatre to them. A circus production by a great clown."
links.polish: „To było dla nich jak teatrzyk. Cyrkowy spektakl jakiegoś klauna”.
links.belarusian: „Гэта было для іх як тэатр. Як цыркавое прадстаўленне выдатнага клоўна”.

links.title: You: ""Was this party against the law? On..."
links.english: "Was this party against the law? On the ice like this -- it was probably a public danger."
links.polish: „Czy ta impreza była niezgodna z prawem? Takie rzeczy na lodzie to chyba publiczne zagrożenie”.
links.belarusian: «Гэтая вечарынка была незаконнай? Вось так, на лёдзе, яна верагодна з'яўлялася пагрозай грамадству.»

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not as such, no. Let's keep moving..."
links.english: "Not as such, no. Let's keep moving, detective."
links.polish: „Nie sama w sobie. Ruszajmy dalej, detektywie”.
links.belarusian: «Сама па сабе - не. Пойдзем далей, дэтэктыў».

links.title: You: "Guess I'll be on my way. (Finish th..."
links.english: Guess I'll be on my way. (Finish thought.)
links.polish: No to ruszam w drogę. (Zakończ myśl).
